name: Flip (itch) (suribe)
description:
Check the official page, http://perroelectrico.com/flip/, for more information and to buy Flip.

Flip is a casual puzzle game that will challenge your brain and your perception.
This is a free version, the full game features four puzzle types and more than 1000 puzzles in total.

Meanwhile, stay tuned through twitter (@pelectrico) or Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/FlipPuzzle).
